meanings.definition: Having or serving more than one function or purpose.
meanings.sent1: The multifunction tool can be used for many different tasks.
meanings.sent2: She bought a multifunction printer that can print, scan, and copy documents.
meanings.sent3: The multifunction jacket not only keeps you warm but also has hidden pockets for snacks!
meanings.sent4: Her multifunctional brain was like a Swiss Army knife, able to handle various challenges.
meanings.sent5: The multifunctional smartphone was a lifesaver during her travels.

meanings.definition: A device or system that performs multiple functions.
meanings.sent1: The multifunction device in the kitchen can blend, chop, and mix ingredients.
meanings.sent2: Their new multifunctional watch not only tells time but also tracks their fitness activities.
meanings.sent3: The multifunction printer decided to take a break after a long day of scanning and printing.
meanings.sent4: The multifunctional robot was like having a personal assistant at home.
meanings.sent5: The multifunctional car had built-in GPS, entertainment system, and safety features.
